name: List Records
description: List/query records from a table with optional pagination. Returns records sorted by created_at (newest first). Use query_table for advanced filtering.

limit.description: Optional: Maximum number of records to return

offset.description: Optional: Number of records to skip (for pagination)

target_space.description: Optional: List from a specific named space (e.g., 'creative', 'education'). Defaults to current space.
